resources.string: Icons and data sourced from OpenWeather!
No city name detected. Please input a valid city name.
Please check your network connection and try again.
Invalid city name. Please check your spelling and input a valid city name.
If any settings were changed, please restart the app.
This location is already a favorite!
Are you sure you want to delete all of your favorite locations?
Q: Why do I not see any information?

A: You have not searched for a city yet in the top text field and you do not have any cities set as a \"Favorite\". Please make sure that you are typing the city name using the Roman alphabet (ex. A B C D).
Q: Why is the weather information for the wrong city or for a city with the same name, but in a different country?
A: Currently the app does not have the ability to differentiate between any similarly named cities, unless the search contains a country code.
For example, if \"Rome\" is searched for, the data shown will be from Rome, New York, United States.
If the country is specified, such as \"Rome,IT\", then the Weather data will be for Rome in Italy.
Q: What does the blue/purple background color mean?
A: The app retrieves the Weather data of a city in the specified timezone it is located in.
The blue background is to help indicate that it is daytime wherever the city is, purple will indicate nighttime.
